name: canva_scrape_brand
description: Scrape Canva brand resources and guidelines page. Returns available brand templates, color palettes, font pairings, and brand kit features.

steps.code: const titleEl = document.querySelector('h1, [class*="hero"] h1'); const descEl = document.querySelector('[class*="hero"] p, [class*="subtitle"], [class*="description"]'); const sections = []; const sectionEls = document.querySelectorAll('section, [class*="section"]'); for (let i = 0; i < Math.min(sectionEls.length, 10); i++) { const el = sectionEls[i]; const headingEl = el.querySelector('h2, h3'); const textEl = el.querySelector('p'); if (headingEl) { sections.push({ heading: headingEl.textContent.trim(), text: textEl ? textEl.textContent.trim().substring(0, 300) : '' }); } } const templates = []; const templateEls = document.querySelectorAll('a[href*="/templates/"], [class*="template"] a, [class*="card"] a'); for (let i = 0; i < Math.min(templateEls.length, 8); i++) { const el = templateEls[i]; const nameEl = el.querySelector('[class*="title"], h3, [aria-label]'); const imgEl = el.querySelector('img'); templates.push({ title: nameEl ? nameEl.textContent.trim() : (el.getAttribute('aria-label') || ''), image: imgEl ? imgEl.getAttribute('src') : '', url: el.href || '' }); } const toolEls = document.querySelectorAll('[class*="tool"] a, [class*="feature"] a'); const tools = []; toolEls.forEach(function(el) { const t = el.textContent.trim(); if (t && t.length < 80 && !tools.includes(t)) tools.push(t); }); return { brand_topic: `{{brand_topic}}`, title: titleEl ? titleEl.textContent.trim() : '', description: descEl ? descEl.textContent.trim().substring(0, 500) : '', sections: sections, templates: templates, tools: tools.slice(0, 10), url: window.location.href }
